title: Taitara
titleTooltip: He ingoa poto, whakaahuatanga mo te kōrero
uploadArtefactButtonTooltip: Ngā pāpāho whaipānga ki te kōrero
locationTooltip: He kōrero poto mō te tauwāhi te wāhi rānei e hono ana ki te kōrero
mentionTooltip: Te hunga, te hāpori hoki e kōrerotia ana e hono rānei ki te purākau
descriptionTooltip: He whakāturanga hōhonu mo te kōrero
contributorTooltip: A Contributor is the person or people who contributed to the submission of the story into the archive
collectionTooltip: A Collection is a grouping of stories
relatedRecordsTooltip: Related records are stories that have a close connection and are used to guide viewers from one story to another
contributorNotesTooltip: He horopaki tāpiri mō te kōrero pakiwaitara rānei
formatTooltip: Te āhua a-tinana, a-tihi rānei o te pakiwaitara, o ngā taonga rawe rānei
identifierTooltip: He ahurei, tino kore kōrero mo te kōrero
sourceTooltip: Source provides a reference to the resource or institution from where the story is contributed or originated
languageTooltip: Te reo kua horaina mai mo ngā kōrero, mo ngā rawa pāpāho
transcriptionTooltip: Transcription is a plain text field used to provide a text transcription or translation of an audio or video recording, or of text in an image or document
access: E āhei ana koe me tō kotahi te uru atu ki tēnei rua
